headerParameters.description: Key-value mapping of the headers that need to be sent as part of request invoking the API Gateway REST API or EventBridge ApiDestination.

pathParameterValues.description: The path parameter values to be used to populate API Gateway REST API or EventBridge ApiDestination path wildcards ("*").

queryStringParameters.description: Key-value mapping of the query strings that need to be sent as part of request invoking the API Gateway REST API or EventBridge ApiDestination.
